metaDescription: Introducing GlobX, the AI-powered automated trading bot.
heroTagline: The Most Efficient and Transparent Risk Minimization System
featuresMainDesc: The AI-based automated trading system monitors the market 24/7 and automatically executes trades at optimal timing. Leave complex market analysis to GlobX, and you just monitor your profits.
feature1Desc: Provides diverse trading strategies to respond to market volatility and maximize returns.
feature2Desc: It does not stop until profits are realized, ensuring you capture every market opportunity.
feature3Desc: Uses a top-tier security system to safely protect and trade your assets.
firstTimeCard1Desc: GlobX monitors the market and captures the best trading opportunities even while you sleep.
firstTimeCard2Desc: Generate profits automatically without complex chart analysis or market monitoring.
case1Desc: GlobX automatically handled trades during a busy work schedule, resulting in stable and consistent profits.
case2Desc: Beginner investors can also safely manage their assets easily with a simple interface.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to your questions about GlobX.
faqA1: Yes, GlobX encrypts and stores API keys and uses only trading permissions (no withdrawal permission) to safely protect your assets.
faqA2: We use AI algorithms based on various technical indicators like Moving Averages, RSI, and Bollinger Bands.
faqQ3: Does it support coins other than Bitcoin?
faqA3: Yes, it supports major altcoins like Ethereum and Ripple, and users can set up their preferred coins.
faqQ4: Is it available on PC and mobile?
faqA4: Yes, it provides an optimized responsive web design for all devices including PC, tablets, and mobile.
faqQ5: Is there a chance of losing capital?
faqA5: All investments carry risk. However, the AI is designed to minimize losses through built-in stop-loss functionality.
faqA6: In addition to the basic bot usage fee, exchange fees may apply. Please refer to the pricing page for details.
